overview: Joaquin, 16 years old, meets Bloo, of the same age. Through this 5 minutes and 43 seconds we can appreciate the start, growth and end of this peculiar relationship, with a lot of little details and intentions, thoughts and wishes, reflected in the acts of Joaquin and all the things that surrounds him and live in his mind. On the other hand, this story has a lot of forms of interpretation. So, at the time of watching it, It's very important to disconnect from everything, to contemplate it by the way you like the most, depending your thoughts and experiences of life. Based on the song 'Treehome95' by Tyler, The Creator.
